Anton Olsson-Collentine

          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            
          
          
            
              I am a PhD candidate with the Meta-research Center at Tilburg University. My research interests include meta- and multiverse analyses, the interpretation of statistical output and facilitating statistical best practices.
            
            
              I am a PhD candidate with the Meta-research Center at Tilburg University. My research interests include meta- and multiverse analyses, the interpretation of statistical output and facilitating statistical best practices.
